Header: President appoints three Governors and two State Ministers
Content: Three Governors and two new State Ministers have taken oaths before President Maithripala Sirisena. Rajith Keerthi Tennekoon took oaths as the Governor of the Central Province. Maitri Gunaratne has been appointed as the Governor of the Uva Province. Hemal Gunasekara took oaths as the Governor of the Southern Province. Meanwhile, Anoma Gamage took oaths as the new State Minister for Petroleum Resource Development while Lucky Jayawardena took oaths as the State Minister for City Planning, Water Supply and Higher Education before President Maithripala Sirisena.
